name: Music Ball Run
description:
Make the ball bounce with the rhythm from tile to tile and try to go as far as you can in this fun and addictive game.

Follow the music, don't skip a beat!

*Simply drag left and right on your screen to guide the ball through the road

*Play with awesome electro music songs

*Beat your friends' score and make it to the end of the game

*Enjoy beautiful design and discover colorful universes
